languages.text: "Битва случится, ибо запах замысленного преступления ведет меня, а раз есть преступление, должен быть и злоумышленник. Если Лорд-инквизитор прибыл сюда, чтобы противостоять ему — мы поможем. Если же он оступился и сошел с пути служения Императору — мы его покараем. Никто не безгрешен пред Ним, даже Калькасар".

"A battle is imminent, for I am guided by the scent of a crime in the making, and where there is a crime, there is a criminal. If the Lord Inquisitor came here to oppose this malefactor, then we shall help him. If the Warden of the Expanse has erred and abandoned the path of service to the Emperor, then we shall punish him. None are without fault before the Protector, not even Calcazar."
languages.original_text: "Битва случится, ибо запах замысленного преступления ведет меня, а раз есть преступление, должен быть и злоумышленник. Если Лорд-инквизитор прибыл сюда, чтобы противостоять ему — мы поможем. Если же он оступился и сошел с пути служения Императору — мы его покараем. Никто не безгрешен пред Ним, даже Калькасар".

If the Lord Inquisitor came here to oppose this malefactor, then we shall help him. If the Warden of the Expanse has erred and abandoned the path of service to the Emperor, then we shall punish him. None are without fault before the Protector, not even Calcazar."

languages.text: "Ein Kampf steht bevor, denn ich werde vom Gestank eines Verbrechens gelenkt, und wo es ein Verbrechen gibt, gibt es auch einen Verbrecher. Falls der Großinquisitor hier ist, um den Übeltäter zu stellen, werden wir ihm helfen. Sollte der Hüter der Ausdehnung den Weg des Dienstes am Imperator verlassen haben, werden wir ihn bestrafen. Niemand ist ohne Fehl vor dem Beschützer, nicht einmal Calcazar."
languages.original_text: "A battle is imminent, for I am guided by the scent of a crime in the making, and where there is a crime, there is a criminal. If the Lord Inquisitor came here to oppose this malefactor, then we shall help him. If the Warden of the Expanse has erred and abandoned the path of service to the Emperor, then we shall punish him. None are without fault before the Protector, not even Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Kampf steht bevor, denn ich werde vom Gestank eines Verbrechens gelenkt, und wo es ein Verbrechen gibt, gibt es auch einen Verbrecher. Falls der Großinquisitor hier ist, um den Übeltäter zu stellen, werden wir ihm helfen. Sollte der Hüter der Ausdehnung den Weg des Dienstes am Imperator verlassen haben, werden wir ihn bestrafen. Niemand ist ohne Fehl vor dem Beschützer, nicht einmal Calcazar."

languages.text: « La bataille est inévitable, car je suis guidée par la pestilence d'un crime en devenir, et qui dit crime dit criminel. Si le seigneur inquisiteur est venu ici pour s'opposer à cette âme scélérate, nous lui prêterons main-forte. Mais si le gardien des Étendues s'est écarté du droit chemin au service de l'Empereur, alors nous le punirons. Personne n'est parfait devant le Protecteur, pas même Calcazar. »
languages.original_text: "A battle is imminent, for I am guided by the scent of a crime in the making, and where there is a crime, there is a criminal. If the Lord Inquisitor came here to oppose this malefactor, then we shall help him. If the Warden of the Expanse has erred and abandoned the path of service to the Emperor, then we shall punish him. None are without fault before the Protector, not even Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: « La bataille est inévitable, car je suis guidée par la pestilence d'un crime en devenir, et qui dit crime dit criminel. Si le seigneur inquisiteur est venu ici pour s'opposer à cette âme scélérate, nous lui prêterons main-forte. Mais si le gardien des Étendues s'est écarté du droit chemin au service de l'Empereur, alors nous le punirons. Personne n'est parfait devant le Protecteur, pas même Calcazar. »

languages.text: 「戦いは間近に迫っている。故にこそ、私は犯罪の匂いに導かれてやってきた。犯罪のあるところには、犯罪者がいるものだ。ロード・インクィジターが犯罪者に対処するためにここにやってきたのであれば、彼を手助けしよう。もしエクスパンスの監視者が皇帝への奉仕の道を誤り、放棄したのであれば、我々は彼を罰しよう。守護者の前に過失を看過される者はいない。カルカサルでさえもだ」
languages.original_text: "A battle is imminent, for I am guided by the scent of a crime in the making, and where there is a crime, there is a criminal. If the Lord Inquisitor came here to oppose this malefactor, then we shall help him. If the Warden of the Expanse has erred and abandoned the path of service to the Emperor, then we shall punish him. None are without fault before the Protector, not even Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: 「戦いは間近に迫っている。故にこそ、私は犯罪の匂いに導かれてやってきた。犯罪のあるところには、犯罪者がいるものだ。ロード・インクィジターが犯罪者に対処するためにここにやってきたのであれば、彼を手助けしよう。もしエクスパンスの監視者が皇帝への奉仕の道を誤り、放棄したのであれば、我々は彼を罰しよう。守護者の前に過失を看過される者はいない。カルカサルでさえもだ」

languages.text: «Se avecina una batalla, pues me guía el olor de un crimen en ciernes, y allá donde hay crimen, hay un criminal. Si el Lord Inquisidor ha acudido a oponerse a este malhechor, le apoyaremos. Si el Guardián de la Extensión ha errado y abandonado la senda del servicio al Emperador, le castigaremos. Ninguno de nosotros carece de defectos frente al Protector, ni siquiera Calcazar».
languages.original_text: "A battle is imminent, for I am guided by the scent of a crime in the making, and where there is a crime, there is a criminal. If the Lord Inquisitor came here to oppose this malefactor, then we shall help him. If the Warden of the Expanse has erred and abandoned the path of service to the Emperor, then we shall punish him. None are without fault before the Protector, not even Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: «Se avecina una batalla, pues me guía el olor de un crimen en ciernes, y allá donde hay crimen, hay un criminal. Si el Lord Inquisidor ha acudido a oponerse a este malhechor, le apoyaremos. Si el Guardián de la Extensión ha errado y abandonado la senda del servicio al Emperador, le castigaremos. Ninguno de nosotros carece de defectos frente al Protector, ni siquiera Calcazar».

languages.text: “战斗迫在眉睫，我嗅到罪恶正在酝酿。哪里有罪恶，哪里就有罪人。如果大审判官来这里是为了惩处罪人，那我们应当助他一臂之力。如果扩区的守护者犯下了罪行，背叛了侍奉帝皇的道路，那我们就要对他进行惩处。在神皇面前，所有人都是有过错的，哪怕是卡尔卡扎也不例外。”
languages.original_text: "A battle is imminent, for I am guided by the scent of a crime in the making, and where there is a crime, there is a criminal. If the Lord Inquisitor came here to oppose this malefactor, then we shall help him. If the Warden of the Expanse has erred and abandoned the path of service to the Emperor, then we shall punish him. None are without fault before the Protector, not even Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: “战斗迫在眉睫，我嗅到罪恶正在酝酿。哪里有罪恶，哪里就有罪人。如果大审判官来这里是为了惩处罪人，那我们应当助他一臂之力。如果扩区的守护者犯下了罪行，背叛了侍奉帝皇的道路，那我们就要对他进行惩处。在神皇面前，所有人都是有过错的，哪怕是卡尔卡扎也不例外。”

languages.text: "Bizi bir savaşın beklediği kesin çünkü beni buraya getiren şey, gerçekleştirilmekte olan bir suç idi. Eğer ortada bir suç varsa bir de suçlu vardır. Lord Engizisyoncu buraya bu suçlunun karşısına çıkmak için geldiyse ona yardım ederiz. Eğer Enginlik'in Dizdarı hataya düşmüşse ve İmparator'un hizmetkârlığı yolundan sapmışsa onu cezalandırırız. Koruyucu'nun karşısında kimse masum değildir. Calcazar bile."
languages.original_text: "A battle is imminent, for I am guided by the scent of a crime in the making, and where there is a crime, there is a criminal. If the Lord Inquisitor came here to oppose this malefactor, then we shall help him. If the Warden of the Expanse has erred and abandoned the path of service to the Emperor, then we shall punish him. None are without fault before the Protector, not even Calcazar."
